Name: Hill Climb
About the game: 'Hill Climb' is a car parkour game. Players can control different cars to play the game. When the car touches gold coins, they can get extra points. The terrain of the game will change constantly. Players need to constantly adjust the speed of the car, otherwise the car will overturn! [Game control] Right keyboard button: forward Left keyboard button: Back [Game features] If the speed of the car is too fast, the front end of the car will rise. At this time, you need to reduce the speed of the car, or the car will overturn. The terrain of the game will change constantly. You need to control the speed of the car according to the current terrain. There are many different cars to choose from in the game, and different cars have different performances. The game has certain difficulty, and friends who like challenges can try it.
